member.name: T:Bazam.Wpf.UIHelpers.DataContextSpy
member.summary: DataContextSpy by Josh Smith Found here :http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/27432/Artificial-Inheritance-Contexts-in-WPF Allows us to do things like use a variable set in a view's data context in a listbox itemtemplate in the same view

member.name: P:Bazam.Wpf.UIHelpers.DataContextSpy.IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem
member.summary: Gets/sets whether the spy will return the CurrentItem of the ICollectionView that wraps the data context, assuming it is a collection of some sort. If the data context is not a collection, this property has no effect. The default value is true.
